content: helix socks mid-calf socks with unisex design 3 sizes foot circumference s 7 m 8 l 9 designed by anna zhuravleva © anna zhuravleva 2021 for personal use only page 1 materials yarn any fingering/sport weight sock yarn to match the gauge 2 colors 175 210 m per 50 g it is better to use one solid colored and one printed yarn for this pattern yardage yarn a solid 50-60 g yarn b printed 20-30 g yarn ideas  drops nord  gruendl hot socks uni / printed  drops fabel uni color / long print  schachenmayr regia  sandnesgarn sisu  novita venla needles notions us 0-1 5 2-2 5 mm needles to match the - 2 stitch markers gauge - darning needle dpns kit or 32 - 40 80-100mm circular - sock blockers optional gauge and size size s 30-34 m 35-37 l 38-40 foot circumference 7 8 9 stitches 48 60 72 gauge is 30 st in 10 cm in stockinette use yarn 200-210 m/50 g glossary  st s stitch es  sl slip_stitch purl-wise  r round  k2tog knit 2 sts together  rs/ws right/wrong side  p2tog purl 2 sts together  m marker  ssk slip 1 st knit-wise slip 1 st  k knit knit-wise knit these 2 sts together  p - purl through the back loop  ktbl - knit the stitch through the back loop © anna zhuravleva 2021 for personal use only page 2 color a solid basic yarn color b printed additional yarn ribbing use any stretchy cast on method to cast on with color a 48 60 72 sts and join in the round careful not to twist sts twisted german cast on is recommended r1 k1 p1 repeat till the end of the round r2 ktbl1 p1 repeat till the end of the round repeat r2 8 10 12 more times leg r11 13 15 k all stitches also with color a r12 14 16 take color b and knit all sts to 1 st until the end of the round knit the last st in the st of the previous round to avoid the step see photo the st is indicated with red circle r13 15 17 take color a and knit all sts to 3 st until the end of the round slip these 3 sts r14 16 18 take color b and knit all sts 3 st before the color change place 6 sts until the end of the round slip 3 sts of color a you are now at the place where the color a thread is k3 last sts with color a r15 17 19 with color a knit all sts 3 st before the color change place 9 sts until the end of the round slip 3 sts of color b you are now at the place where the color b thread is k6 last sts with color b continue to work this way until the desired
